Date: Friday, 1/31/1999
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Todd Worrell



Date: Saturday, 2/1/1999
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!

Regards,
Todd Worrell



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1999
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Todd Worrell
